setting.name: UserName
setting.label: User name
setting.description: User name sent to SIP Registry server to authenticate as

setting.name: SipServer
setting.label: SIP Server
setting.description: If non-empty, all out-going SIP messages will be delivered to this SIP Proxy Server for the SIP URI. If you send outgoing SIP messages to another server enter full host name

setting.name: AutoRegister
setting.label: Auto Register
setting.description: Immediately upon starting, attempt to register with SIP Server

setting.name: qValue
setting.label: Q Value
setting.description: From 0.0 to 1.0, if mulitple SIP clients register with this same SIP address, the incoming calls will be directed to the highest Q values. Identical Q Values will be called in unison. See RFC 3263 for more information.
